data.title: Greenlawn Cemetery, Marshall County, WV Cemeteries
data.text:
Greenlawn Cemetery and Mt. Rose cemeteries are located at Moundsville, WV, in back of the former site of Fostoria Glass Factory and 1st Street. The two cemeteries are divided by a row of large trees. Since the cemeteries are close together, there may be some conflicts about which cemetery a person is buried in. In most cases, the death records were used to resolve conflicts, but a few are not certain.
